A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I honestly thought this film is a masterpiece of a Star Wars movie\, this film has a bit that everyone\, Star Wars fan or not\, can enjoy. It balances humour with intense situations very well which honestly is a strength as it is very hard to do. Overall I thought this film was amazing and heart felt. My favourite Star Wars yet\, and this is coming from a proper film nerd!
